title: NFL,NFLPA Zeke War, Luck And Mariota Concerns (Football 08/16)
description:
Pete Prisco, Will Brinson and Nick Kostos take a look at the biggest NFL news, including an update on Ezekiel Elliott's suspension and the NFL/NFLPA public battle over the ruling (1:05), Brock Osweiler potentially being "groomed" to start for the Browns (14:33), whether Blake Bortles is battling dead arm (17:46), the Saints injury issues (25:10), Jaylon Smith's return (27:03), Myles Garrett as a historical rookie (28:16), the Raiders being the top Super Bowl bet (30:45) and Pete's trip to Titans camp (32:48), which included seeing some concerns with Marcus Mariota and being amazed by Christian McCaffrey. Then the guys recap Game of Thrones and talk about their recent trip to Las Vegas.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
